Name: Bricky to Me
About the game: A knight, a mysterious cat and a castle where the whole scenario is dynamically modified, creating rooms and rooms with incredible challenges to overcome. Brick to Me puts you on a Puzzle Platform full of dynamically arranged rooms with a random path to the confrontation with “Space Mania”. Over 60 rooms randomly assembled Intriguing puzzles A kitten that needs be peted A boomerange to defeat enemies A very unusual boss fight Enter into Bricky to Me and try to escape from this random castle
Meta Title: Bricky to Me: Nov 4, 2021, IdunaSoft and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bricky to Me? Check out the release date (Nov 4, 2021), developer insights from IdunaSoft, and a complete game summary.
